data.name: Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader
data.description: Remarkably agile and aggressive warrior. Dangerous even for those with shield coverage...
data.location: Ringleader's Evergoal, Liurnia of the Lakes

data.name: Alabaster Lord
data.description: An Evergaol prisoner wielding a vicious sword and the void with murderous intent.
data.location: Royal Grave Evergaol, Liurnia of the Lakes

data.name: Adan, Thief Of Fire
data.description: An evergaol prisoner and former battle mage, Adan wields a spiked flail and uses stolen knowledge of fire magic to great effect.

data.name: Ancient Dragon Lansseax
data.description: Lansseax was the sister of Fortissax. It is said that she took the from of a human to commune with the knights as a priestess of the ancient dragon cult.

data.name: Ancestor Spirit
data.description: A glowing spirit that takes the form of a large deer, making it a menacing threat when charging at targets.

data.name: Ancient Hero Of Zamor
data.description: Noticeably agile, frost-made creature suceptible to magic attacks.

data.name: Beast Clergyman
data.description: Temporarily overtaken by their bestial rage, the Beast Clergyman attacks ferociously, throwing rocks and themselves at their foes. Calm their aggression and return them to their senses.

data.name: Astel, Stars Of Darkness
data.description: A hostile, massive Dragon-Fly creature. Menacing and extremely powerful.
data.location: Yelough Anix Tunnel in Consecrated Snowfield

data.name: Beast Of Farum Azula
data.description: Underground-living creature found at Groveside Cave

data.name: Beastman Of Farum Azula
data.description: The beasts of Groveside Cave rally around the prowess of the Beastman of Farum Azula

data.name: Bell Bearing Hunter
data.description: Menacing and slow-paced, it wields a large, red-glowing sword and a shield combined with a full body armor and a chilling cape.
data.location: Warmaster's Shack, Northern Stormhill, Church of Vows, East Liurnia, Hermit Merchant's Shack, Leyndell Royal Captial, Dragonbarrow, North Caelid

data.name: Black Knife Assassin
data.location: Deathtouched Catacombs, Black Knife CatacombsSage's Cave

data.name: Bloodhound Knight Darriwil
data.description: The merciless bloodhounds attack with grace and agility, never backing down or giving a moment's rest.

data.name: Burial Tree Watchdog
data.description: A large feline-hound looking guardian that serves as a "Watchdog"for the Burial Tree of the Stormfoot Catacombs.

data.name: Cleanrot Knight
data.description: Powerful, dexterous Knight capable of distanced, very rapid attacks. Its spear and sword are a threat to any light-armored fighter.
data.location: Stillwater Cave, Liurnia of the Lakes

data.name: Borealis The Freezing Fog
data.description: Frost Dragon guarding the frozen lake of Mountaintop of Giants, emits a permanent blizzard.

data.name: Commander Niall
data.description: Commander Niall is a tall and built knight with a peg leg, clad in heavy armor, wielding a halberd that doubles as a battle standard. He is accompanied by two Spectral Banished Knights, one equipped with dual swords and the other equipped with a sword and shield.

data.name: Commander O'neil
data.description: A large and imposing human commander who wields a halberd that doubles as a battle standard, rousing his spirit minions to battle with unquenchable fervor.

data.name: Crucible Knight Ordovis
data.description: Large, heavy and fully armored. With the ability to materialize fiery wings and attack from above. Attacks with the huge power of Ordivis's Greatsword and a Greatshield. Slow, but extremely tough and highly dangerous.

data.name: Deathbird
data.location: Limgrave, Weeping Peninsula, Liurnia of the Lakes

data.name: Decaying Ekzykes
data.description: A pale white dragon — its scales blighted by the same scarlet rot that plagues the region of Caelid. It silently waits along the southern highway, awaiting unsuspecting travelers to fall prey to its deathly onslaught.

data.name: Demi-human Chief
data.description: The darkness of Coastal Cave hides a den of those who may look almost human, but are certainly not.

data.name: Demi-human Queen Maggie
data.description: Sovereign Demi-Human creature roaming the lands of Mt. Gelmir

data.name: Divine Bridge Golem
data.description: Enormously large and lethargic Golem that slowly storms into battle when it becomes aware of your presence.

data.name: Demi-human Queen Margot
data.description: Sovereign Demi-Human creature concealed within isolated caves.

data.name: Dragonkin Soldier
data.description: A large, hostile humanoid creature awaken from its drowse straight into battle.

data.name: Cemetery Shade
data.description: Amorphous and shadowy being belonging to the catacombs
data.location: Tombsward Catacombs, Black Knife Catacombs,Caelid Catacombs,

data.name: Crucible Knight
data.description: A formidable, dexterous fighter skilled in melee combat.
data.location: Stormhill Evergaol,, Stormveil Castle,, Auriza Hero's Grave

data.name: Dragonkin Soldier Of Nokstella
data.description: Huge humanoid-like creature located at the underground caves of Uhl Palace Ruins

data.name: Dragonlord Placidusax
data.description: A massive in size, two-headed dragon capable of immense acts of annihilation.

data.name: Elden Beast
data.description: It is said that long ago, the Greater Will sent a golden star bearing a beast into the Lands Between, which would later become the Elden Ring.

data.name: Elemer Of The Briar
data.description: Wielding the stolen sword from the Marais family, Elemer of the Briar stands at the top of the castle waiting.

data.name: Erdtree Avatar
data.location: Minor Erdtree (Weeping Peninsula), Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Southwest), Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Northeast), Minor Erdtree (Caelid), Minor Erdtree (Mountaintops East)

data.name: Fallingstar Beast
data.description: A massive quadruped with a long spiky tail and a head reminiscent of a centipede's, with massive mandibles protruding from its face. It behaves much like a bull and appears to have seismic powers, allowing it to control the earth within its chamber.
data.location: Sellia Crystal Tunnel, Caelid, Altus Plateau

data.name: Fell Twins
data.description: Two bulky ogre-like creatures fighting side by side with red-hot armament

data.name: Flying Dragon Agheel
data.description: A feared-by-most massive dragon located within the Dragon-Burnt Ruins in Limgrave

data.name: Fire Giant
data.description: Upon realizing the flames of their forge would never die, Queen Marika, marked him with a curse. "O trifling giant, mayest thou tend thy, flame for eternity.

data.name: Flying Dragon Greyll
data.description: A large grey dragon, Flying Dragon Greyll patrols the bridge breathing fire and flying down on those trying to cross.

data.name: God-devouring Serpent
data.description: A massive, menacing reptile that poses a remarkable threat.

data.name: Glintstone Dragon Smarag
data.description: A fearsome magic dragon with crystalized magic stone for scales. Jealously guards the entrance to the Academy's Crystal Cave.

data.name: Glintstone Dragon Adula
data.description: A powerful and devastating dragon, a menace for all type of fighters.

data.name: Godrick The Grafted
data.description: Godrick the Grafted is the ruler of Stormveil Castle, wielding a large golden axe. He has grafted many arms on his body, a symbol of power to all those who might try to depose him.

data.name: Godskin Apostle And Godskin Noble
data.description: They are found in their spirit forms, spawned by the opportunist Spirit-Caller Snail.
data.location: Spiritcaller Cave, Mountaintops of the Giants

data.name: Death Rite Bird
data.description: Immense bird skeleton with crow-like features. Rushes to battle from above while wielding a giant spear.

data.name: Godskin Apostle
data.description: The apostles, one said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.

data.name: Godskin Noble
data.description: The most aggresive of the Godskin.

data.name: Grafted Scion
data.description: An amorphous blob that wields two swords and a shield, and appears to be grafted with multiple arms.

data.name: Great Wyrm Theodorix
data.location: North of Albinauric Rise in Mountaintops of the Giants

data.name: Guardian Golem
data.description: The Guardian Golem, magical constructs that has been cut and chiseled from stone. It is the sole guardian of the Highroad Cave who holds a precious item.

data.name: Godskin Duo
data.description: A complementing pair of creatures extremely well versed in dual-battling. These beings achieve an exceptionally balance in combat, resulting in a devastating synergy.
drops: Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado

data.name: Kindred Of Rot
data.description: Large, prawn-like creatures skilled at melee combat. Its Pest's Glaive poses a menace when wielded by these agile beings.

data.name: Leonine Misbegotten
data.description: Aggressive and feral, the Misbegotten sees nothing but rage

data.name: Mad Pumpkin Head
data.description: A huge ogre-looking creature that has a large pumpkin helmet worn on its head. It wields a massive flail and seems to be guarding something or someone against intruders.
data.location: Waypoint Ruins, Limgrave, Caelem Ruins, Caelid

data.name: Magma Wyrm
data.description: A large lesser dragon with bronze-colored scales covering its body. Magma Wyrms inhabit deep cave systems and volcanos, thriving within lava-flooded environments.

data.name: Lion Guardian
data.description: The Lion Guardian of Stormveil has been coerced into service by cruel means

data.name: Malenia, Blade Of Miquella
data.description: ...Heed my words. I am Malenia. Blade of Miquella. And I have never known defeat.

data.name: Maliketh, The Black Blade
data.description: O, Death. Become my blade once more.

data.name: Miranda The Blighted Bloom
data.location: Weeping Peninsula: Tombsward Cave, Altus Plains: Perfumer's Grotto

data.name: Mimic Tear
data.description: An eccentric being capable of taking a comprehensive shape of its adversary, ranging from body features to armament.

data.name: Misbegotten Crusader
data.location: Cave of the Forlorn in Mountaintops of the Giants

data.name: Mohg, Lord Of Blood
data.description: Welcome, honored guest. To the birthplace of our Dynasty!

data.name: Magma Wyrm Makar
data.description: Aggressive Fire Wyrm guarding the entrance to Altus Plains from any who attempt to bypass the lift

data.name: Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest
data.description: A duo of warriors comprised of the female Swordstress, who uses a sword with a whip-like function to attack at medium range and a male Priest who uses spells from afar.

data.name: Omenkiller
data.location: Village of the Albinaurics, Volcano Manor, Perfumer's Grotto

data.name: Onyx Lord
data.description: Ancient guardian of the Divine Tower Entrance.

data.name: Perfumer Tricia
data.description: A long range spellcaster complemented by an armored, short-distance warrior.

data.name: Putrid Grave Warden Duelist
data.description: Grave Wardens protect the secrets of the ancients, but the corruption of the land has affected them too

data.name: Pumpkin Head
data.description: The breaking disrupted the flora and fauna of the region. Some took a rather intense liking to the larger plants that emerged

data.name: Radagon Of The Golden Order
data.description: Lord Radagon was a great champion, possessed of flowing red locks. He came to these lands at the head of a great golden host, when he met Lady Rennala in battle. He soon repented his territorial transgressions though, and became husband to the Carian Queen. However. When Godfrey, first Elden Lord, was hounded from the Lands Between, Radagon left Rennala to return to the Erdtree Capital, becoming Queen Marika's second husband and King Consort. Taking the title... of second Elden Lord.

data.name: Red Wolf Of Radagon
data.description: Fierce guardian and protector of its master, even when it has long left.
data.location: Raya Lucaria Academy, Liurnia of the Lakes

data.name: Regal Ancestor Spirit
data.description: A spirit glowing in pale blue light, suspended in the air and taking the shape of a huge deer.

data.name: Royal Knight Loretta
data.description: The eternal guardian of Caria Manor fervently defends her domain atop the Royal Moongazing Grounds. Loretta uses her greatbow to rain destruction on all who would dare approach the estate grounds.

data.name: Royal Revenant
data.description: An obscene and disturbing abomination, blend of a spider-like creature and human limbs resulting in a quite resourceful fighter at close range.
data.location: Kingsrealm Ruins, Liurnia of the Lakes

data.name: Runebear
data.description: Ferocious, robust creature that's huge in size and remarkably agressive.

data.name: Rykard, Lord Of Blasphemy
data.description: Join the Serpent King, as family... Together, we will devour the very gods!

data.name: Sir Gideon Ofnir, The All-knowing
data.description: Sir Gideon Ofnir, now far from the books and immersed in battle.

data.name: Spirit-caller Snail
data.description: The ultimate Spiritcaller.
drops: Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado
